original_title: 羞恥！ 新任女教師が学習教材にされる男子校の性教育 生徒の目の前で無遠慮な指が膣に挿入される！プライドは崩壊するが、子宮の奥から愛液があふれ出る 9
overview: In recent years, when boys are becoming herbivorous, our school places particular importance on health and physical education classes. The naked body of a female teacher is treated as a learning material, and you can actually see and touch the elasticity of the chest and the complex structure of the genitals, and learn about textures that you cannot understand with a model. From the second period onwards, we support sex education guidance so that virgin students will not be troubled in the future through more practical training on the mechanism of pregnancy and male-female birth control exercises.
title: Shame! Sex Education At A Boys' School Where A New Female Teacher Is Used As A Learning Material A Reluctant Finger Is Inserted In The Vagina In Front Of A Student! The Pride Collapses, But The Joy Juice Overflows From The Back Of The Womb 9
